pkgmetadata.longdescription: # BeBop Sensors Forte Data Glove## 64-bit Python Module of the DataGlove API### Prerequisite:64-bit version of Python### Simple Setup:```pythonfrom dataglove import *leftHand = Forte_CreateDataGloveIO(1, "") # 0 for right-handed glovetry:while True:try:sensors = Forte_GetSensors(leftHand)imu = Forte_GetIMU(leftHand)print(sensors)print(imu)except(GloveDisconnectedException):print("Glove is Disconnected")passexcept(KeyboardInterrupt):Forte_DestroyDataGloveIO(leftHand)exit()```#### Core API
